criteria: E2E test for Trip Creation -> Assignment -> Start -> POD Upload is passing; All P1 and P2 bugs from Sprint 1 & 2 resolved; Driver Portal login is functional on both iOS and Android.
bypass_criteria: Not bypassable. This gate validates the core business value.
success_metrics: 100% pass rate on core workflow E2E tests.

criteria: E2E test for Trip -> Invoice -> GSP Sandbox IRN Generation is passing; PDF invoice format is confirmed compliant by finance stakeholder; Resilient error handling for GSP API is demonstrated and passes tests.
bypass_criteria: Not bypassable. This is a legal compliance gate.
success_metrics: Successful generation of a compliant e-invoice in the GSP sandbox environment.

criteria: Successful and validated full data migration dry-run in staging; All high-priority bugs resolved; Final performance and security scans are clean; All reports are functional and validated by stakeholders.

tools_used: Migration Validation Scripts, SonarQube, OWASP ZAP
success_metrics: Formal sign-off on migration validation report; Zero critical or high-severity security vulnerabilities.
